main event: Observers watched a bright, reddish disk-shaped object traveling rapidly in the sky near Crosby, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object traveled a distance of about 3 miles before disappearing abruptly,The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds to 1 minute,It was observed at a distance of about 1 mile,The object appeared to be 5 to 10 feet long, clear weather conditions were present during the sighting.
witness description: Observed from a kitchen table, looking out a window.
